main event: A round, bright red stationary object was reported in Macomb County, Michigan.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 hours., The object was initially thought to be a UFO., Investigators concluded it was a bright red marker light on top of a 50-foot radio antenna., The object was located approximately 1,040 yards northwest of the civilian observer., Binoculars were used by investigators to view the object.
